info.title: Zenith Payments Developer Guide - Merchant APIs
info.description: OpenAPI specification generated from Postman collection: Zenith Payments Developer Guide - Merchant APIs

operations.description: This method is used to upload batch payments as a collection of JSON and process them.

operations.summary: Fetch Batch Payment Summary by batchPaymentID
operations.description: This method returns a summary of a batch payment using the batchPaymentID.

operations.summary: Fetch Batch Payment Transactions by batchPaymentId
operations.description: This method returns a list of entries in a batch payment.

Generate a card proxy.

Not recommended for software / sites that are not PCI DSS compliant. For a easy and secure card tokenisation and payment option, see our Payment Plugin jQuery.

This endpoint is locked behind a setting and can only be utilized once it has been enabled by Zenith Payments.
Delete card proxy permanently from the system. This will not affect any customer, registered using this proxy.

parameters.name: paymentAmount
parameters.description: (Required) Payment amount to determine the pricing

operations.summary: Fetch all Customers based on the filters

parameters.name: customerReference
parameters.description: Customer reference

parameters.name: customerStatuses
parameters.description: Customer statuses. Default is all. 0 - Open, 1 - AwaitingEmailVerfication, 2 - AwaitingSignature, 3 - SetUpIncomplete, 4 - Restricted, 5 - Closed, 6 - OnHold

parameters.name: fromOpenDate
parameters.description: From Customer open date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: toOpenDate
parameters.description: To Customer open date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: fromClosedDate
parameters.description: From Customer closed date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: toClosedDate
parameters.description: To Customer closed date. Format: yyyy-MM-dd

parameters.name: paymentOptions
parameters.description: Payment options. Default is all. 22 - AutoPay, 23 - EmailReminder, 24 - SmsReminder, 25 - FixedTerm, 26 - BatchPay, 27 - ScheduledPay, 28 - OneOff, 148 - PayID, 149 - BPAY

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Starting index of the record. An index starts from 0. Default = 0

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Page size. Default = 20. Maximum page size allowed = 2000

operations.description:
List of all customers.

It will display all customers regardless of customerStatus. It will include closed customers as well.

operations.summary: Fetch Customer payment method by customerReference

operations.description:
StartFragment

Customer Bank/Credit Card account. Use PaymentAccountProxy or CreditCardProxy or BankAccount.  
If more than one details are passed, only one detail used as per the following order, 1. PaymentAccountProxy 2. BankAccount 3. CreditCardProxy  
Preferred option is PaymentAccountProxy

EndFragment

operations.summary: Fetch Customer payment options by customerReference
operations.description:
PaymentOptions human readable form:

AutoPay: 22; EmailReminder: 23; SmsReminder: 24; FixedTerm: 25; BatchPay: 26; ScheduledPay: 27; OneOff: 28; PayID: 148; BPAY: 149

PaymentFrequency human readable form:

Weekly: 32; Fortnightly: 33; Monthly: 34; Quarterly: 35; HalfYearly: 36; Yearly: 37; FourWeeks: 38

NotificationMethod human readable form:

None: 0; Sms: 1; Email: 2

parameters.name: customerReference
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by the customer reference

parameters.name: fromProcessedDate
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by the payments from date

parameters.name: toProcessedDate
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by the payments to date

parameters.name: settlementDate
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by the payments settlement date

parameters.name: paymentSettlement
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by if the payment is settled to the merchant. "0" payment is not settled. "1" payment is settled to the merchant

parameters.name: transactionTypes
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by the different transaction types

parameters.name: transactionTypes
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by the different transaction types

parameters.name: isRecalled
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by if the payments are in recalled status

parameters.name: isRefunded
parameters.description: (Optional) Filter by if the payments are in refunded status

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: (Optional)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: (Optional)

operations.description:
### Important Notice for Using the Direct Card Payment Option:

This endpoint allows the submission of raw card details (`cardNumber`, `expiryMonth`, `expiryYear`, `cvv`) for processing payments. **However, this method requires a certain level of PCI DSS (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard) compliance** to ensure the secure handling of sensitive card information. To enhance security and reduce the risks associated with directly managing card data, we strongly recommend using our **Payment Plugin jQuery** for secure card tokenization and payment processing.

**Please note:** This endpoint is restricted and can only be accessed once it has been enabled by Zenith Payments. Ensure you have the necessary permissions and configurations in place before attempting to use this method. For access or further assistance, please contact us at [integrations@zenithpayments.com.au](https://mailto:integrations@zenithpayments.com.au).
